column4: hello, I'm totally new to linux and can't get dvds to play... anyone feel like doing a good deed?
After you insert a DVD (assuming it's a movie DVD), what happens?
If you want to remove it, try finding the DVD icon on the desktop and right-clicking, then selecting "eject". This sometimes ejects stubborn discs
Sorry, I didn't know that you couldn't play DVD's in Ubuntu unless you added packages. Someone else here can likely point you in the right direction
